data.name: Detective Fantasia DX
data.detailed_description:
A corpse has been found on the beach of Dune Island, and only detective Fantasia can uncover the truth behind it.
In Detective fantasia DX, you get to investigate with complete freedom:

• Explore freely the entirety of Dune Island from the beginning!

• Talk to whoever you want, check every nook and cranny!

• Open you're notebook to read any conversation you've already had

• If you spot an inconsistency in any dialogue, select the contradicting lines to unlock new dialogues!

• Once you've discovered every inconsistencies on the island, be ready to face the mind-blowing truth behind this mystery...

data.short_description: A corpse has been found on the beach! Explore a summery island to gather clues and uncover the truth in this mystery game, Detective Fantasia DX!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8 or 10
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128MB
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
